name: 高淩菁
objective: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據
schedule:
週次	日期	課程大綱進度
1	9/12	Course overview & Ch1
2	9/19	Ch2  Tabular and Graphical Methods 
3	9/26	Ch3  Numerical Descriptive Measures (1)
4	10/3	Ch3  Numerical Descriptive Measures (2)
5	10/10	Class Recess: Double Tenth Day
6	10/17	Ch4  Introduction to Probability (1)
7	10/24	Ch4  Introduction to Probability (2)
8	10/31	Exam 1
9	11/7	Ch 5  Discrete Probability Distributions (1) 
10	11/14	Ch 5  Discrete Probability Distributions (2)
11	11/21	Ch 6  Continuous Probability Distributions (2)
12	12/28	Ch 6  Continuous Probability Distributions (3)
13	12/5	Exam 2
14	12/12	Ch 7  Sampling & Sampling Distributions (1)
15	12/19	Ch 7  Sampling & Sampling Distributions (2) 
16	12/26	Ch 8  Interval Estimation (1)
17	1/2	Ch 8  Interval Estimation (2) 
18	1/9	Exam 3
scorePolicy:
Exam 1: 25%	Exam 2: 25%			
Exam 3: 30%	統計會考: 20%
materials: Business Statistics: Communicating with Numbers, by Jaggia and Kelly, 3th Edition
